alert.note: Alert for Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 27 at 11:58PM MST until February 28 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... North central Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 100 AM MST * At 1157 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located 12 miles west of Knolls, or 26 miles east of Wendover, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 23 and 53. Locations impacted include... Clive, Knolls and Utah Test and Training Range North. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED
